author: Pete Hunt
title: The Baconator
text: Bacon ipsum dolor amet sausage spare ribs tail prosciutto ham hock chicken cow tenderloin venison. Tongue pork belly shank kielbasa drumstick. author: Pete Hunt
title: Burgers

author: Pete Hunt
Title: Eat some Meat
text: Brisket t-bone ribeye, jowl hamburger ground round sausage pork pork chop kevin tenderloin shoulder venison swine tongue. Kevin tongue picanha, capicola spare ribs ball tip pork. author: Pete Hunt
title: More Meats for Pete
text: Venison pork sirloin, shankle turducken tail tongue short loin pig cow. Picanha shank pig, tenderloin t-bone pork chop flank ham hock sirloin rump cupim. Kevin tail shankle venison beef ribs ham hock meatball. Tri-tip pig pork loin bresaola jowl ham hock jerky hamburger. author: Pete Hunt
title: The Final Meat
text: Ball tip ham hock cow landjaeger. Chuck rump bacon, beef ribs pork chop boudin flank landjaeger tri-tip beef t-bone cow. Hamburger turducken sausage porchetta kevin brisket. Salami porchetta leberkas flank ham hock.
